introductionTemplate.title: # AI Playground
introductionTemplate.description: Welcome to the AI Playground, where you can leverage AI to explore repositories, create interactive 3D scenes, and get assistance with your code. Select a mode to get started!
introductionTemplate.securityNote: Your OpenAI API key is securely handled server-side and never exposed to the client browser. All interactions are rate-limited and content-filtered for safety.
featuresSection: - **Repository Explorer**: Get AI-powered insights about your GitHub repositories
- **Scene Creator**: Generate and preview Three.js 3D scenes using natural language
- **Code Assistant**: Get help understanding, documenting, and improving your code
introductionTemplate.usageInstructions:
## How to Use

1. Choose a mode from the tabs above
2. Follow the specific instructions for each tool
3. The AI will process your request and provide results in the appropriate format

*Note: Generation may take a few seconds depending on request complexity*
